data.title: Quality Bread
data.text: This bakery offer freshly made bread and dessert-type breads in a variety of flavors and the owners are friendly.

data.title: Great bread and bakery experience
data.text: My husband and  I usually stop by once a month after my hair appointment.  The smells are WONDERFUL!  Lots of different kinds of breads scones and cookies.  Oh, did I mention free samples? Worth one's while to make a stop.

data.title: I'm in carbohydrate heaven!
data.text:
So many fantastic options in terms of breads and baked goods. From the first bite, the quality of ingredients and use of whole grain flour is evident. If you are looking for an option to cater a breakfast meeting, consider getting a tray or muffins, scones, and fruit bars. This is sure to be a huge hit! The giant cinnamon rolls are also hard to resist.

In terms of bread, they have so many different varieties including your standard white, wheat, sourdough. I love the cinnamon swirl. (The pumpkin swirl is good, but cinnamon is my favorite.) Recently, I picked up a loaf of "Red, White, and Blue" (cranberries, blueberries, and apples) at the local farmer's market. Yum! It was easy to slice and even survived the toaster. The wheat rolls are hearty and freeze very well. You really can't go wrong with whatever you choose. The staff is friendly and helpful and will steer you in the right direction.

data.title: Amazing Breads
data.text: This is a must visit place if you're in Lafayette. We have loved every bread we've ever bought here. The dessert breads are an absolute must! We stop every chance we get and when we visit the farmers market.

data.title: A Must Stop When In Lafayette, IN
data.text: Stopped to pick-up a loaf of raisin-cinnamon bread to take home for breakfast.  A must stop store whenever we are in town.  The chocolate chip/peanut butter cookie is to die for as well.  They have several selections of breads to choose from and we have never found any that wasn't good-don't go home without stopping at this store!

data.title: Best Bread in Town
data.text: We get bread here regularly for any special occasion or whenever we want some REAL, all natural oven baked bread.  Great selection of bakery treats as well.  Vanilla-Almond and Cinnamon Swirl are fantastic sweet breads.  The country french white bread is wonderful for sandwiches or soup.

data.title: Dakota bread is a perennial favorite
data.text: Great Harvest Bread Company is a Lafayette/WL institution. It has a strong following and reputation, both of which are much deserved. GH consistently does a great job, and fills an important niche in the local food landscape. Their Dakota bread is one of our favorites.

data.title: Cinnamon Rolls!!!
data.text: Forget the chain cinnamon roll place and go here!  Best cinnamon roll I've had in a long time!!  Box lunches are good.  Huge sandwich with chips and a cookie.  All of the bread is great, too!  Location is easy to find.  Friendly staff.

data.title: Great sandwich place!
data.text: I love sandwiches and I'm always looking for something homemade and fresh.  Great Harvest is a great place to go for just that!  Plus, you always get a free slice of bread while you wait!
